markdownRemark.html:
To a reasonable creature, the same action is both according to nature, and according to reason.

IX. Straight of itself, not made straight.

Whatsoever is material, doth soon vanish away into the common
substance of the whole; and whatsoever is formal, or, whatsoever doth animate…
